title: Miners of Bolivia
creator_contributor_role: Institut für Film und Bild, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Tin mines and mining
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Bolivia - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Bolivia - Politics and government
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Mining districts - Social aspects
description: A study of the work and submarginal living of tin-ore miners of Altiplano is presented against a background of the natural beauty of Bolivia. Shows effect of the terrain and climate on the Indians' lives, and surveys the problems that have contributed to poverty in certain areas of the country.
